title: Notion Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Notion workspace for knowledge management and collaboration

specs.title: Create Notion connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid Notion OAuth client ID and secret from Notion developer console
specs.when: user creates a new Notion connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject Notion connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create Notion connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update Notion connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
